<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3301</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Marvellous Toy -learning past simple tense</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erstaunliches Spielzeug - erlernend hinter 
einfachem Tempus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Jouet merveilleux - apprenant après le temps 
simple</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Brinquedo maravilhoso - aprendendo após o tempo 
simples</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Giocattolo meraviglioso - imparando oltre il 
tempo semplice</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θαυμάσιο παιχνίδι - προηγούμενος απλός χρόνος 
εκμάθησης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Juguete maravilloso - aprendiendo más allá de 
tiempo simple</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This song is a good way to learn and review the simple past tense of regular and irregular verbs.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">learning strategies</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">grammar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">verbs</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">tenses</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Lied ist eine gute Methode, die einfache 
Vergangenheit der regelmäßigen und unregelmäßigen Verben zu 
erlernen und zu wiederholen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette chanson est une bonne voie d'apprendre et 
passer en revue le passé simple des verbes réguliers et 
irréguliers.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta canção é uma maneira boa aprender e rever
o tempo passado simples de verbos regulares e irregulares.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa canzone è un buon modo imparare e 
rivedere il passato semplice dei verbi normali ed irregolari.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το τραγούδι είναι ένας καλός τρόπος να 
μαθευτεί και να αναθεωρηθεί ο απλός αόριστος των κανονικών και 
ανώμαλων ρημάτων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta canción es una buena manera de aprender y 
de repasar el tiempo pasado simple de verbos irregulares regulares y.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lernenstrategien</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grammatik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
